Deepa Devangmath

Architect | Urban Designer | Interior Specialist

{/* Introduction Section */}

Introduction

I am a licensed architect from India, currently in my ninth year of studying architecture. My re- search delves into how space impacts human behavior and, in turn, their mental well-being. My de- sign philosophy centers on creating harmony between context, built form, and users. I have actively collaborated on various live projects and take great interest in conducting case studies of thought- fully designed spaces, focusing on their construction methods, material choices, and zoning strat- egies.

I strongly believe that collaboration, empathy, and attentive listening are key to developing meaningful architectural solutions.

); }; export default About;
